```{r}
library(dplyr)

```


```{r}
file_path <- '../data/deseq2_differential/phenotype_comparison.deseq2.results.tsv'
tx2gene_path <- '../data/tx2gene.tsv'
```

```{r}
file <- read_table(file_path)
tx2gene <- read_table(tx2gene_path) %>% 
  select(gene_id, gene_name) %>%
  distinct()
```


```{r}
res_with_names <- file %>%
  left_join(tx2gene, by = "gene_id")
```
